ing: 2 (19 ounce) cans chickpeas (garbanzos), drained and rinsed
des: "Delicious and inexpensive, this is a breeze to whip up. You will love this sunny salad packed with seasonal tomatoes, basil, and garlic. An awesome take-along salad for work with some whole-grain pita wedges or a whole-grain bun, or a nice side for grilled chicken, pork, or fish! I heat the salad dressing (before adding the chopped garlic) in the microwave 30 seconds to ensure the honey incorporates."
ins:
Toss chickpeas, tomatoes, feta cheese, and basil together in a large mixing bowl.
Put honey in a small glass bowl; heat in microwave 30 seconds. Stir garlic, red wine vinegar, cider vinegar, olive oil, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and salt with the honey to make a dressing; pour over the chickpea salad and toss to coat.
Cover the mixing bowl with plastic wrap. Refrigerate salad for 1 hour before serving.
